message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it's a good value for my budget.

I understand that $8000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $9500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value and quality of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering $8500. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
